summary: 1987  was a common year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Donald James Cram  was an American chemist who shared the 1987 Nobel Prize in Chemistry with Jean-Marie Lehn and Charles J. Pedersen "for their development and use of molecules with structure-specific interactions of high selectivity." They were the founders of the field of host-guest chemistry.
title: Donald J. Cram
